metadata.creator: Isaac Hymer
metadata.description:
I used to be pretty big in the Roblox ripoff/sandbox game development community circa 2016/17-2019, and website source code was constantly leaked.

This is the source code of one of, if not the first, the first SANS websites, SocialParadise, ran from 2012 to 2013 by Isaac Hymer.

I probably got this from a "SANS source code download" website that briefly existed in 2018. The date comes from the first log message reported in the error log - Jan 30, 2012. The site was not launched for several months after that.

WARNING: THIS CODE IS TERRIBLE AND VERY INSECURE!
metadata.subject: sans
metadata.title: SocialParadise [SANS Site Source Code]
metadata.subject: isaac hymer
